typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Activity_Assigned_Office__c as string,
		Activity_Org__c as string,
		Investment_Promotion__c as boolean,
		RH_Lev_1_GM_All__c as string,
		RH_Lev_2_DAS__c as string,
		RH_Lev_3_Region_2__c as string,
		RH_Lev_4_Region_1__c as string,
		RH_Lev_5_Country__c as string,
		RH_Lev_6_Office__c as string,
		RH_Lev_7_Individual__c as string,
		Related_to_Case__c as boolean,
		Actual_Create_Date__c as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		Subject as string,
		WhatId as string,
		WhoId as string,
		Priority as string,
		Status as string,
		TaskSubtype as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceStageActivity
sourceStageActivity split(IsDeleted ==toBoolean('0'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitIsdeletedtrueandfalse@(isdeletedequalto0, isdeletedequalto1)
ConditionalSplitIsdeletedtrueandfalse@isdeletedequalto0 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplitIsdeletedtrueandfalse@isdeletedequalto1 alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Activity_Assigned_Office__c as string,
		Activity_Org__c as string,
		Investment_Promotion__c as boolean,
		RH_Lev_1_GM_All__c as string,
		RH_Lev_2_DAS__c as string,
		RH_Lev_3_Region_2__c as string,
		RH_Lev_4_Region_1__c as string,
		RH_Lev_5_Country__c as string,
		RH_Lev_6_Office__c as string,
		RH_Lev_7_Individual__c as string,
		Related_to_Case__c as boolean,
		Actual_Create_Date__c as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		Subject as string,
		WhatId as string,
		WhoId as string,
		Priority as string,
		Status as string,
		TaskSubtype as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinktomaintable
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Activity_Assigned_Office__c as string,
		Activity_Org__c as string,
		Investment_Promotion__c as boolean,
		RH_Lev_1_GM_All__c as string,
		RH_Lev_2_DAS__c as string,
		RH_Lev_3_Region_2__c as string,
		RH_Lev_4_Region_1__c as string,
		RH_Lev_5_Country__c as string,
		RH_Lev_6_Office__c as string,
		RH_Lev_7_Individual__c as string,
		Related_to_Case__c as boolean,
		Actual_Create_Date__c as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		Subject as string,
		WhatId as string,
		WhoId as string,
		Priority as string,
		Status as string,
		TaskSubtype as string
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinktodelete
